name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makima Holding Denji with Chains Live Wallpapers

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browser with Makima holding Denji in chains, featuring dynamic visuals, shortcuts, and a sleek, minimalist design.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
